params._challengeUrl: IPFS URL with the challenge Livestream video
params._jsonUrl: IPFS URL with the challenge JSON data
params._teamCount: Total number of unique options for the challenge

params._challengeUrl: IPFS URL of the challenge livestream
IPFS URL of the challenge livestream
params._resolution: integer representation of resolution results (1) Succeed, (2) Fail, (3) Refund

params._challengeUrl: IPFS URL of the challenge livestream
IPFS URL of the challenge livestream

donate(string,uint256,address).notice: Users can donate to a challenge

resolveChallenge(string,uint256,uint256).notice: The Shenanigan DAO Agent can call this function to finalize challenge results

withdrawBalance(string,address[]).notice: Challenger can retrieve donations when challenge returns successful and the Succeed status is applied

withdrawDonation(string,address[]).notice: User can retrieve their donation if the Challenge is deemed malicious and the Refund status is applied

userdoc.notice: Deployed by an athlete A user can make a challenge for themself by calling createChallenge() Users can then add donations to this contract by calling donate() Challenges can be resolved by calling resolveChallenge() from the Shenanigan DAO Agent.
